about_the_game:
After a long journey, you sit down to play some games while flying to another planet. Unfortunately, your distraction caused an asteroid hit your rocket and wake up in an unfamiliar place. Explore dig, fight, trade, level up, upgrade and build your way back to the space age for glory and and a new high score on your game. Trade with NPCs and Invest for a better future.

MINE RESOURCES AND CRAFT

Dig your way through different layers to discover unique structures and collect resources. Craft your way to the space age by upgrading your tools with better resources, and craft machinery to help you automate the process of smelting and crafting.

BATTLE ENEMIES AND BOSSES IN UNDERGROUND COMBAT

Test your skills by fighting your way through big and small hostile dwellers in this underground frenzy. Level up your skills and build new weapons and armor to enhance your mining and combat abilities.

BUILD, CRAFT AND AUTOMATE 

Upgrade and build your way back to the space age so you can make a rocket and get back to your "important Business" before you were rudely interrupted. Build glorious bases and create factories to accelerate your progress, avoid tedious work and imprint your mark upon the land.

EXPLORE WITH ANOTHER PLAYER

Take a friend to experience the unique world and fight underground monstrosities together in this 1-2 player mining and combat adventure.

After a long journey, you sit down to play some games while flying to another planet. Unfortunately, your distraction caused an asteroid hit your rocket and wake up in an unfamiliar place. Explore dig, fight, trade, level up, upgrade and build your way back to the space age for glory and and a new high score on your game. Trade with NPCs and Invest for a better future.

name: Lands of Mine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Client Version 1607+
  • Processor: 4-Core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or dedicated GPU with 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires .NET 6.0 Runtime to be installed.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Client Version 1903+
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with 2 GB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires .NET 6.0 Runtime to be installed.

short_description: Mine resources, craft tools, and battle fierce underground enemies as you explore, trade, and build your way back to the stars. Level up, upgrade your gear, and automate your processes for ultimate efficiency. Play solo or team up with a friend in this 1-2 player mining and combat adventure.
